Package game

Class Bushes

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
game.Bushes
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, GroundInterface
public class Bushes
extends Ground
A class that represents the bushes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Bushes()
    the constructor for the bush to have the display char *

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Actions allowableActions​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction)
    Returns the actions that the player can do to the bush and here it is only picking fruits from the bush.
    java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> getFruits()
    gets the list of fruits that are in the bush
    void killBush​(Location location)
    checks whether a brachiosaur is on this bush and is called on every turn if there is a brachiosaur on the bush there is 50% chance that the bush dies.
    Fruit produceFruit()
    produces a fruit on the bush
    Fruit removeFruit()
    removes a fruit from the bush once it may be plucked or eaten from the bush
    boolean ripening()
    the class checks if the chances for a ripe fruit to be produced is right and calls a method to produce a fruit on the bush and then adds the returned fruit to the bush
    void tick​(Location location)
    the passage of time for this bush through each turn and what the bush does in each turn, it only tries to ripen a fruit on each turn, and it checks if a brachiosaur currently stepped on it and will have a 50% chance to kill the bush.

    Methods inherited from class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground

    addCapability, blocksThrownObjects, canActorEnter, getDisplayChar, hasCapability, removeCapability

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    Methods inherited from interface edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.GroundInterface

    getFish, getSips, removeFish, removeSip

    • allowableActions

      public Actions allowableActions​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction)
      Returns the actions that the player can do to the bush and here it is only picking fruits from the bush.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor acting
      location - the current Location
      direction - the direction of the Ground from the Actor
      Returns:
      a new, empty collection of Actions

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      the passage of time for this bush through each turn and what the bush does in each turn, it only tries to ripen a fruit on each turn, and it checks if a brachiosaur currently stepped on it and will have a 50% chance to kill the bush.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Ground
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the Ground

    • ripening

      public boolean ripening()
      the class checks if the chances for a ripe fruit to be produced is right and calls a method to produce a fruit on the bush and then adds the returned fruit to the bush
      Returns:
      whether or not a fruit was created on the bush

    • produceFruit

      public Fruit produceFruit()
      produces a fruit on the bush
      Returns:
      the fruit that was created

    • getFruits

      public java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> getFruits()
      gets the list of fruits that are in the bush
      Returns:
      the array list of all the fruits on this bush

    • removeFruit

      public Fruit removeFruit()
      removes a fruit from the bush once it may be plucked or eaten from the bush
      Returns:
      the fruit that was removed from the list of fruits on the bush

    • killBush

      public void killBush​(Location location)
      checks whether a brachiosaur is on this bush and is called on every turn if there is a brachiosaur on the bush there is 50% chance that the bush dies.
      Parameters:
      location - the current location of the bush
